findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function massUpdatePools() uses a loop to update all pools, which may cause out of gas issues if the array length is too big.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to perform critical operations such as minting tokens, changing operators list, recording referral addresses and commissions, updating pool configurations, and more.
